channel.title: How to add maps
channel.description:
Hello there,
I was wondering how you could add a map to an area that is white. Example: When I teleport to say Ardougne or the gnome training arena, the ground is a whitish color. Only the objects are there.
Can anybody help me with this? Thanks!
